display_long_description:
# Fast. Fluid. Ferocious
Descend into the abyss and tear through handcrafted arenas where speed, precision, and raw power rule. Plasmaborne is a high-intensity single-player VR roguelike shooter built for players who crave momentum, mastery, and chaos.
[media]
# Evolve with Every Death
Fall. Rise. Adapt. Collect upgrades, forge new builds, and return stronger than before. Each failure feeds progress, sharpening your instincts and unlocking new ways to fight.
[media]
# Dual-Wield Destruction
Build your own loadout, each hand with a powerful weapon and layer on passives that reshape your playstyle. Build your kit in the lobby, then unleash it in the arena. Every run becomes a different kind of chaos.
[media]
Fusing tight gunplay, brutal melee, and searing flamethrower chaos into one relentless VR combat experience.
[media]
# Handcrafted Arenas. Infinite Replay
Each battleground pushes fresh tactics and reactions. Learn enemy behaviors, chain stylish dashes, and ride perfect momentum through escalating challenges.
